tool_description: Matches extracted visual features against regional plant database to identify most likely plant species candidates with confidence scores.

matching_algorithm.description: Matching method: simple, weighted, fuzzy, neural

max_candidates.description: Maximum number of species candidates to return

error_messages: Insufficient visual features: Need at least 3 distinct visual features for reliable matching
Empty regional species list: Ensure Regional Flora Database returned valid species
Invalid matching algorithm: Use simple, weighted, fuzzy, or neural
No matches above threshold: Consider lowering confidence_threshold or rechecking image quality
usage: Input visual_features from analyzer and regional_species from database. Adjust confidence_threshold and max_candidates to control result precision vs coverage.

match_reasons.description: Key features that led to each match
